title: Fin Reporting & Analy I
description: Study of the techniques and concepts surrounding the construction of financial reports, including Intermediate-level treatment of revenue recognition, inventories, contacts, interest capitalization, property and equipment, intangibles, long-term liabilities, and shareholders' equity. Significant emphasis on financial analysis.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: MGT 6000 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
